Returning Pike Uncommon 2~11 Damage 1d10+1Piercing Homing Weapon: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A 'Crazy Wilbur' is a technique invented by the dwarvish Ticklebeard Clan. It involves getting your larger enemies to swallow your weapon, then calling it back to you - as messily as possible. PikeTwo-HandedThrown Extra Reach 8.1 65

Homing Weapon: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown.
